kernel_size.additional_notes: Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

detect_hard_decision_environment_activit.description: The maximum environment activity of the pixel (the difference between the maximum and minimum Y component values in the pixel neighborhood, . excluding the candidate pixel) is less than LUMA_DCTHRSH. Decreasing this parameter results in fewer peak identifications. 0 = Condition is disabled.
detect_hard_decision_environment_activit.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_hard_decision_distance_from_avera.description: The difference between the Y component of the candidate pixel and the average Y component value of its . neighboring pixels (excluding candidate pixel) is at least LUMA_DCLEVEL. . Increasing this parameter results in fewer peak identifications. 255 = Condition is disabled.
detect_hard_decision_distance_from_avera.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_soft_decision_distance_from_avera.description: soft decision function for distance_from_avg vs activity. . distance_from_avg (for peak) is greater or equal than min ( max ( ( (slope * activity ) + offset , lower_limit ) , 255);.
detect_soft_decision_distance_from_avera.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_soft_decision_distance_from_avera.description: soft decision function for distance_from_avg vs activity. . distance_from_avg (for peak) is greater or equal than min ( max ( ( (slope * activity ) + offset , lower_limit ) , 255);. 255 is disabled.
detect_soft_decision_distance_from_avera.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_soft_decision_distance_from_avera.description: soft decision function for distance_from_avg vs activity. . distance_from_avg (for peak) is greater or equal than min ( max ( ( (slope * activity ) + offset , lower_limit ) , 255);.
detect_soft_decision_distance_from_avera.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_extreme_decision_distance_from_ma.description: The maximum difference between the Y component of the candidate pixel and the Y component of its neighboring pixels is at least detect_extreme_decision_distance_from_maxmin. . Increasing this parameter results in fewer peak identifications. Max( pixel_val - env_max, env_min-pixel_val ). 255 = Condition is disabled.
detect_extreme_decision_distance_from_ma.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_dcsize_decision_sensitivity.description: Rank peak identification flags a peak when a sufficient number of neighbors around a . pixel are identified as flat (regardless of whether the current pixel is flat or not). The following parameters control the minimum number of flat neighbors for identifying a peak in each length. 128 is all neighbores. 129 is disable.
detect_dcsize_decision_sensitivity.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

correction_mode.description: 0 - Correct using area smart selection. (closest pixel value in the 3x3 environment). 1 - Correct using flattest direction. area smart is recommended. This parameter should be modified only in FULL pass. DC4, DC16,DC64 Passes should always use area smart selection.
correction_mode.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Nearest neighbor interpolation: discrete values allowed.

correction_area_smart_min_inner_distance.description: Area smart selection can be made more robust to larger peaks by increasing correction_nl_mode_thr. This value will result taking a pixel value closer to the median of 3x3. 0 - take the closest pixel value. 3- take the median.
correction_area_smart_min_inner_distance.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

correction_isotropic_activity_threshold.description: Non edge-preserving is enabled based on following thresholds. Peaks with environment activity below these thresholds are corrected using non edge-preserving filtering. Peaks with environment activity above these thresholds are corrected using edge preserving filtering. (either area smart or flattest direction based on user settings of correction_mode ).
correction_isotropic_activity_threshold.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_hard_decision_environment_activit.description: The maximum environment activity of the pixel (the difference between the maximum and minimum UV component values in the pixel neighborhood, . excluding the candidate pixel) is less than DCTHRSH. Decreasing this parameter results in fewer peak identifications. 0 = Condition is disabled.
detect_hard_decision_environment_activit.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_hard_decision_distance_from_avera.description: The difference between the Y component of the candidate pixel and the average UV component value of its . neighboring pixels (excluding candidate pixel) is at least DCLEVEL. . Increasing this parameter results in fewer peak identifications. 255 = Condition is disabled.
detect_hard_decision_distance_from_avera.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_soft_decision_distance_from_avera.description: soft decision function for distance_from_avg vs activity. . distance_from_avg (for peak) is greater or equal than min ( max ( ( (slope * activity ) + offset , lower_limit ) , 255);.
detect_soft_decision_distance_from_avera.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_soft_decision_distance_from_avera.description: soft decision function for distance_from_avg vs activity. . distance_from_avg (for peak) is greater or equal than min ( max ( ( (slope * activity ) + offset , lower_limit ) , 255);.
detect_soft_decision_distance_from_avera.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_soft_decision_distance_from_avera.description: soft decision function for distance_from_avg vs activity. . distance_from_avg (for peak) is greater or equal than min ( max ( ( (slope * activity ) + offset , lower_limit ) , 255);.
detect_soft_decision_distance_from_avera.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_extreme_decision_distance_from_ma.description: The maximum difference between the Y component of the candidate pixel and the Y component of its neighboring pixels is at least detect_extreme_decision_distance_from_maxmin. . Increasing this parameter results in fewer peak identifications. Max( pixel_val - env_max, env_min-pixel_val ). 255 = Condition is disabled.
detect_extreme_decision_distance_from_ma.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_dcsize_decision_sensitivity.description: Rank peak identification flags a peak when a sufficient number of neighbors around a . pixel are identified as flat (regardless of whether the current pixel is flat or not). The following parameters control the minimum number of flat neighbors for identifying a peak in each length. 128 is all neighbores. 129 is disable.
detect_dcsize_decision_sensitivity.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

correction_mode.description: 0 - Correct using area smart selection. (closest pixel value in the 3x3 environment). 1 - Correct using flattest direction. area smart is recommended. This parameter should be modified only in FULL pass. DC4, DC16,DC64 Passes should always use area smart selection.
correction_mode.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Nearest neighbor interpolation: discrete values allowed.

correction_area_smart_min_inner_distance.description: Area smart selection can be made more robust to larger peaks by increasing correction_nl_mode_thr. This value will result taking a pixel value closer to the median of 3x3. 0 - take the closest pixel value. 3- take the median.
correction_area_smart_min_inner_distance.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

correction_isotropic_activity_threshold.description: Non edge-preserving is enabled based on following thresholds. Peaks with environment activity below these thresholds are corrected using non edge-preserving filtering. Peaks with environment activity above these thresholds are corrected using edge preserving filtering. (either area smart or flattest direction based on user settings of correction_mode ).
correction_isotropic_activity_threshold.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

luma_input_indication_thr_modification_s.description: The strength is the maximal thresh gain factor on current PASS assuming fully flat pixel detected by input indication from the lower pass. The thresh gain factor for every pixel will be based on the maximal value and the flatness of the pixel detected by indication of the lower pass. . 7Q4, example 16 == X1. Actual Possible Values are: [16,17,18,20,24,28,30,32,40,48,56,64,72,80] ( == X [ 1, 1.0625, 1.125, 1.25, 1.5, 1.75, 1.875, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4, 4.5, 5 ] ). all other values will be quantized later to one of the Actual Possible Values.
luma_input_indication_thr_modification_s.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

chroma_input_indication_thr_modification.description: The strength is the maximal thresh gain factor on current PASS assuming fully flat pixel detected by input indication from the lower pass. The thresh gain factor for every pixel will be based on the maximal value and the flatness of the pixel detected by indication of the lower pass. . 7Q4, example 16 == X1. Actual Possible Values are: [16,17,18,20,24,28,30,32,40,48,56,64,72,80] ( == X [ 1, 1.0625, 1.125, 1.25, 1.5, 1.75, 1.875, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4, 4.5, 5 ] ). all other values will be quantized later to one of the Actual Possible Values.
chroma_input_indication_thr_modification.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

luma_center_binarization_minflatval.description: in case center pixel is flatter than center_binarization_minflatval it will indicate the pixel as flat without any regard to neighbores. If not, the decision will be done according to neighbores decision.
luma_center_binarization_minflatval.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

luma_neighbours_binarization_minflatval.description: neighbors are counted as flat if they are flatter than neighbours_binarization_minflatval.
luma_neighbours_binarization_minflatval.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

luma_neighbours_parallel_dist.description: perpendicular neighbourhood size can be 3 or 4. 1- size =3 . 2- size =5.
luma_neighbours_parallel_dist.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

luma_neighbours_perpendicular_dist.description: perpendicular neighbourhood size can be 1 or 3. 0- size =1 . 1- size =3.
luma_neighbours_perpendicular_dist.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

luma_neighbours_agreement_sensitivity.description: if percentage of neighbores are determind as flat (according to comparison with neighbours_binarization_minflatval) is greater than neighbours_agreement_sensitivity, center pixel will be indicated as flat for higher pass.
luma_neighbours_agreement_sensitivity.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

chroma_center_binarization_minflatval.description: in case center pixel is flatter than center_binarization_minflatval it will indicate the pixel as flat without any regard to neighbores. If not, the decision will be done according to neighbores decision.
chroma_center_binarization_minflatval.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

chroma_neighbours_binarization_minflatva.description: neighbors are counted as flat if they are flatter than neighbours_binarization_minflatval.
chroma_neighbours_binarization_minflatva.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

chroma_neighbours_perpendicular_dist.description: perpendicular neighbourhood size can be 1 or 3. 0- size =1 . 1- size =3.
chroma_neighbours_perpendicular_dist.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

chroma_neighbours_agreement_sensitivity.description: if percentage of neighbores are determind as flat (according to comparison with neighbours_binarization_minflatval) is greater than neighbours_agreement_sensitivity, center pixel will be indicated as flat for higher pass.
chroma_neighbours_agreement_sensitivity.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

enable_grey_treatment_dcblend2_chroma_mo.description: dcblend2 will blend as a function of max(greyDCSize,cDCSize) instead of just cDCSize in case that the chromaticity of the lower pass is lower than the chromaticity of the current pass for the current pixel.
enable_grey_treatment_dcblend2_chroma_mo.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Nearest neighbor interpolation: discrete values allowed.

detect_grey_condition_chromaticity_radiu.description: chromaticity is estimated using : 0 - 3x3 circle, 1- 5x5 circle.
detect_grey_condition_chromaticity_radiu.additional_notes: Nearest neighbor interpolation: discrete values allowed.

detect_grey_condition_chromaticity_thr_l.description: Define the conditions for identifying areas as grey - chroma threshold p1 (100% weight), Linear in between p1,p2 (start,end).
detect_grey_condition_chromaticity_thr_l.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_grey_condition_chromaticity_thr_h.description: Define the conditions for identifying areas as grey - chroma threshold p2 (0% weight), Linear in between p1,p2 (start,end).
detect_grey_condition_chromaticity_thr_h.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_grey_condition_y_max_derivative_r.description: y max derivative is calculated using : 0- 3x3 , 1- 5x5.
detect_grey_condition_y_max_derivative_r.additional_notes: Nearest neighbor interpolation: discrete values allowed.

detect_grey_condition_y_max_derivative_t.description: Define the conditions for identifying areas as grey - derivative threshold p1 (0% weight), Linear in between p1,p2 (start,end).
detect_grey_condition_y_max_derivative_t.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_grey_condition_y_max_derivative_t.description: Define the conditions for identifying areas as grey - derivative threshold p2 (100% weight), Linear in between p1,p2 (start,end).
detect_grey_condition_y_max_derivative_t.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_greydcsize_neighbors_chromaticity.description: pixels Neighborhood should have chromaticity lower than this threshold in order to be defined as grey for the calculation of the greydcsize.
detect_greydcsize_neighbors_chromaticity.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

detect_greydcsize_center_detail_chromati.description: if pixel has a higher chromaticity than this threshold it will be defined a chromatc detail and will set greydcsize to zero.

thr_modification_target_y.description: Increase the chroma filter thresholds prior to the CLPF filtering algorithm. If target_y,u,v ==0 then it wont change the thresholds, actually if the target threshold is less than base threshold, then no change will be made.
thr_modification_target_y.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

thr_modification_target_u.description: Increase the chroma filter thresholds prior to the CLPF filtering algorithm. If target_y,u,v ==0 then it wont change the thresholds, actually if the target threshold is less than base threshold, then no change will be made.
thr_modification_target_u.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

thr_modification_target_v.description: Increase the chroma filter thresholds prior to the CLPF filtering algorithm. If target_y,u,v ==0 then it wont change the thresholds, actually if the target threshold is less than base threshold, then no change will be made.
thr_modification_target_v.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

isotropic_filter_blend_factor_scale.description: controls how much blend will be done with the isotropic chroma filtering upto 7x7, depends on GreyDCSize and Isotropic_Filter_Size. blend (with isotropic filtering 7x7) factor fucntion scale as a function of grey edge detection. Function values are 0:64 and as a function of grey edge detection which is also 0:64. scale values are Q4, 7Q4, example 16 == X1 slope. to disable blend with isotropic filter : isotropic_filter_blend_factor_scale == isotropic_filter_blend_factor_offset == 0 .
isotropic_filter_blend_factor_scale.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

isotropic_filter_blend_factor_offset.description: controls how much blend will be done with the isotropic chroma filtering upto 7x7, depends on GreyDCSize and Isotropic_Filter_Size. blend (with isotropic filtering 7x7) factor fucntion scale as a function of grey edge detection. Function values are 0:64 and as a function of grey edge detection which is also 0:64. to disable blend with isotropic filter : isotropic_filter_blend_factor_scale == isotropic_filter_blend_factor_offset == 0 .
isotropic_filter_blend_factor_offset.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

isotropic_filter_size.description: 0- isotropic filter is 3x3. 1- isotropic filter is 5x5. 2- isotropic filter is adaptive (1x1/3x3/5x5/7x7) depends on GreyDCSize (0/1/2/3). 3- isotropic filter is 7x7.
isotropic_filter_size.additional_notes: Nearest neighbor interpolation: discrete values allowed.

median_detect_override_detail_condition_.description: The maximum chromaticity value for which details are disabled.
median_detect_override_detail_condition_.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

median_detect_override_detail_condition_.description: The minimum luma derivative value for which details are disabled.
median_detect_override_detail_condition_.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

median_detect_corner_detail_sensitivity_.description: The local detail sensitivity controls the local conditions logic: . High value - more local details are identified in the image ( = less filtering is performed) . Low value - less local details are identified in the image ( = more filtering is performed). this will multiply the chroma x modifers (scale and offset). Q4 example 16 == X1. 65 to disable median filter.
median_detect_corner_detail_sensitivity_.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.
In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

median_detect_triple_chromaticities_deta.description: Threshold for chroma detail detection, chromaticity difference is calculated from chromaticity 8bits. Higher chromaticity difference than this value is a detail.
median_detect_triple_chromaticities_deta.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

median_detect_triple_chromaticities_deta.description: Threshold for chroma detail detection, chromaticity difference is calculated from chromaticity 8bits. Higher chromaticity difference than this value could be a detail depends on UD Th comparison.
median_detect_triple_chromaticities_deta.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

median_detect_isotropic_self_decision_en.description: 1- if the pixel detected a detail than median wont work on the pixel in the problematic directions, or all directions for isotropic. 0 - pixel self detail wont enforce median not working. Now it depends on the environment decision.
median_detect_isotropic_self_decision_en.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Nearest neighbor interpolation: discrete values allowed.

median_detect_isotropic_neighbors_detail.description: The environment detail sensitivity values determine the importance of the local indications environment in generating a detail flag. . High value - few local detail indications are required to generate detail flag ( = more details, less filtering). Low value - many local detail indications are required to generate detail flag ( = less details, more filtering).
median_detect_isotropic_neighbors_detail.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

median_detect_isotropic_neighbors_detail.description: scale on the sensativity to get sensativity for bigger environment .
median_detect_isotropic_neighbors_detail.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

median_detect_directional_self_decision_.description: 1- if the pixel detected a detail than median wont work on the pixel in the problematic directions, or all directions for isotropic. 0 - pixel self detail wont enforce median not working. Now it depends on the environment decision.
median_detect_directional_self_decision_.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Nearest neighbor interpolation: discrete values allowed.

median_detect_directional_neighbors_deta.description: The environment detail sensitivity values determine the importance of the local indications environment in generating a detail flag. . High value - few local detail indications are required to generate detail flag ( = more details, less filtering). Low value - many local detail indications are required to generate detail flag ( = less details, more filtering).
median_detect_directional_neighbors_deta.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

median_detect_directional_neighbors_deta.description: scale on the sensativity to get sensativity for bigger environment .
median_detect_directional_neighbors_deta.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

bilateral_decision_minimalsize.description: if both bilateral and median are on. The mux that chooses the final result from one of the two is controled by Bilateral_Decision_MinimalSize. If ( chromaOutputDCindications_CDCMinSize is greater or equal than Bilateral_Decision_MinimalSize) then take bilateral output, otherwise thake median output. chromaOutputDCindications_CDCMinSize is in range 0:5 . . 6 is bypass. if the pixel is flatter than this value then use the bilateral filter on it, otherwise just use median filter.
bilateral_decision_minimalsize.additional_notes: Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

bilateral_filtersize.description: 0- bilateral size 1x1 (disabled). 1- bilateral size 3x3. 2- bilateral size 5x5.
bilateral_filtersize.additional_notes: Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

chroma_flat_indication_extension_thresho.description: extension of the flatness indication from 0:3 (1x1 : 7x7) to 0:5 (1x1 : 11x11).
chroma_flat_indication_extension_thresho.additional_notes: Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.
Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

chroma_grey_indication_extension_thresho.additional_notes: Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.
Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

edge_smoothing_binarization_minflatval.description: min flat val in parallel to the edge in order to smooth it. Flat enough means a large edge and could be smoothed. 5 - to bypasse.
edge_smoothing_binarization_minflatval.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

edge_smoothing_binarization_maxedgeval.description: max edge val in perpendicular to the edge in order to smooth the edge. Edge small enough means a strong edge that could be smoothed.
edge_smoothing_binarization_maxedgeval.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

edge_smoothing_agreement_number.description: how many neighbores out of 5 should fulfill the parrallel minflatval condition and the perpendicular maxedgeval condition. This affects also how many neighbores out of 3 should fulfill the conditions.
edge_smoothing_agreement_number.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

transition_smoothing_filter_size.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

transition_isotropic_neighbours_binariza.description: binarization_minflatval, lower value means more areas will be defined as flat which in turn can give filtering in more areas. range [1,4].
transition_isotropic_neighbours_binariza.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

transition_isotropic_neighbours_binariza.description: binarization_minedgeval, lower value means more areas will be defined as edge which in turn can give filtering in more areas. range [0,3].
transition_isotropic_neighbours_binariza.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

transition_isotropic_neighbours_binariza.description: binarization_maxedgeval, higher value means more areas will be defined as edge which in turn can give filtering in more areas. range [0,3].
transition_isotropic_neighbours_binariza.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

transition_isotropic_neighbours_agreemen.description: agreement_sensitivity percentage (out of 128) will set the effective neighbours percetage needs to pass all condtions. 86/128 value is 6/9 or 16/25 depends on transition_smoothing_filter_size. 129 to disable feature.
transition_isotropic_neighbours_agreemen.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

transition_isotropic_neighbours_agreemen.description: percentage (out of 128) of flats voters out of all voters, rest of needed voters should be edges. total number of needed voters is determind by transition_isotropic_neighbours_agreement_sensitivity.
transition_isotropic_neighbours_agreemen.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

flat_isotropic_3x3_neighbours_binarizati.description: mininum flat value to define flat for 3x3 additional isotropic filtering feature.
flat_isotropic_3x3_neighbours_binarizati.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

flat_isotropic_3x3_neighbours_agreement_.description: agreement_sensitivity of the neighbours, size is 3x3 / 5x5 according to transition_smoothing_filter_size. Sensativity 128 requires 100% of neighbours to be flat according to upper threshold. Sensativity 129 is disable feature.
flat_isotropic_3x3_neighbours_agreement_.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

flat_isotropic_5x5_neighbours_agreement_.description: agreement_sensitivity of the neighbours 5x5 according only if transition_smoothing_filter_size ==2, otherwise not operational.. Sensativity 128 requires 100% of neighbours to be flat according to upper threshold. Sensativity 129 is disable feature. binarization_minflatval is always 4 for this condition.
flat_isotropic_5x5_neighbours_agreement_.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

smoothing_kernel_3x3_shift.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

smoothing_kernel_5x5_horver_shift.description: 5x5 horizontal, vertical and off-diagonals only coefficients weight = 2^kernel_5x5_horver_shift. 5x5 main diagonals are weight = 1.
smoothing_kernel_5x5_horver_shift.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

edge_smoothing_binarization_minflatval.description: min flat val in parallel to the edge in order to smooth it. Flat enough means a large edge and could be smoothed. 6 - to bypasse.
edge_smoothing_binarization_minflatval.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

edge_smoothing_binarization_maxedgeval.description: max edge val in perpendicular to the edge in order to smooth the edge. Edge small enough means a strong edge that could be smoothed.
edge_smoothing_binarization_maxedgeval.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

edge_smoothing_agreement_number.description: how many neighbores out of 3 should fulfill the parrallel minflatval condition and the perpendicular maxedgeval condition.
edge_smoothing_agreement_number.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

transition_isotropic_neighbours_binariza.description: binarization_minflatval, lower value means more areas will be defined as flat which in turn can give filtering in more areas.
transition_isotropic_neighbours_binariza.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

transition_isotropic_neighbours_binariza.description: binarization_minedgeval, lower value means more areas will be defined as edge which in turn can give filtering in more areas.
transition_isotropic_neighbours_binariza.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

transition_isotropic_neighbours_binariza.description: binarization_maxedgeval, higher value means more areas will be defined as edge which in turn can give filtering in more areas.
transition_isotropic_neighbours_binariza.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

transition_isotropic_neighbours_agreemen.description: agreement_sensitivity percentage (out of 128) will set the effective neighbours percetage needs to pass all condtions. 86/128 value is 6/9 or 16/25 depends on transition_smoothing_filter_size. 129 to disable feature.
transition_isotropic_neighbours_agreemen.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

transition_isotropic_neighbours_agreemen.description: percentage (out of 128) of flats voters out of all voters, rest of needed voters should be edges. total number of needed voters is determind by transition_isotropic_neighbours_agreement_sensitivity.
transition_isotropic_neighbours_agreemen.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

flat_isotropic_3x3_neighbours_binarizati.description: mininum flat value to define flat for 3x3 additional isotropic filtering feature.
flat_isotropic_3x3_neighbours_binarizati.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

flat_isotropic_3x3_neighbours_agreement_.description: agreement_sensitivity of the neighbours, size is 3x3. Sensativity 128 requires 100% of neighbours to be flat according to upper threshold.. Sensativity 129 is disable feature.
flat_isotropic_3x3_neighbours_agreement_.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

smoothing_kernel_1x1_shift.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

smoothing_kernel_3x3_shift.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear Ceil Interpolation: Do Linear Interpolation and then Ceil.

elliptic_xc.description: XC in the formula: . R(x,y) = (A*(x-XC))^2 + (B*(y-YC))^2. logic value 0 is start of the image, 16384 is the end of the image.

elliptic_yc.description: YC in the formula:. R(x,y) = (A*(x-XC))^2 + (B*(y-YC))^2. logic value 0 is start of the image, 16384 is the end of the image.

elliptic_a.description: A in the formula:. R(x,y) = (A*(x-XC))^2 + (B*(y-YC))^2. B will be detemind by B = (2^16 - A). That way we keep A,B normilized for a valid linear interpulation.

luma_filter_lut_thr_y_tab.description: luma filter Y threshold modifier LUT. Modifier threshold as a function of radius^2 and elipses. 17 entries, each in (0,4,7) bits. . The actual Y threshold will be YbaseThr*luma_filter_lut_thr_y[elliptic radius].

luma_filter_lut_thr_uv_tab.description: luma filter uv threshold modifier LUT. Modifier threshold as a function of radius^2 and elipses. 17 entries, each in (0,4,7) bits. . The actual uv threshold will be U/VbaseThr*luma_filter_lut_thr_uv[elliptic radius].

chroma_filter_lut_thr_y_tab.description: chroma filter Y threshold modifier LUT. Modifier threshold as a function of radius^2 and elipses. 17 entries, each in (0,4,7) bits. . The actual Y threshold will be YbaseThr*chroma_filter_lut_thr_y[elliptic radius].

chroma_filter_lut_thr_uv_tab.description: chroma filter uv threshold modifier LUT. Modifier threshold as a function of radius^2 and elipses. 17 entries, each in (0,4,7) bits. . The actual uv threshold will be U/VbaseThr*chroma_filter_lut_thr_uv[elliptic radius].

strength_modifier_radius_blend_lut_tab.description: LNR Strength Modifier LUT. . Blend factor as a function of radius, the blend factor will be used to blend between original dcblend2_lut (or flat weight) and the dcblend2_lut * target_factor. 17 Entries, values in 0:128 with 7 fraction bits. 128 = don't change ThMult. 0 = blend fully torwards .

luma_lnr_dcblend2_target_factor.description: LNR Luma blend factor (128 is factor 1).

luma_lnr_flat_kernel_weight_target_facto.description: LNR Luma flat blend factor (128 is factor 1). Factor on the weight of the flat kernel for lnr in its maximal target strenght (lut blend ==0).

chroma_lnr_cnr_dcblend2_target_factor.description: LNR CNR Chroma blend factor (128 is factor 1) (max factor). This target factor also serves as the maximal scale factor that lnr and cnr can apply together.

automatic_influence_luma_luts.description: if use_luts_from_full_pass_configuration == 1 then. luma_filter_luts = ( full_pass_luma_filter_luts * automatic_influence_luma_luts + (128-automatic_influence_luma_luts ) * [128,128,...,128] ) is greater thanis greater than 7.

automatic_influence_chroma_luts.description: if use_luts_from_full_pass_configuration == 1 then. chroma_filter_luts = ( full_pass_chroma_filter_luts * automatic_influence_chroma_luts + (128-automatic_influence_chroma_luts ) * [128,128,...,128] ) is greater thanis greater than 7.

automatic_influence_modifier_radius_blen.description: if use_luts_from_full_pass_configuration == 1 then. strength_modifier_radius_blend_lut = ( full_pass_strength_modifier_radius_blend_lut * automatic_influence_chroma_luts + (128-automatic_influence_chroma_luts ) * [128,128,...,128] ) is greater thanis greater than 7.

detect_chromaticity_start_tab.description: Color chromaticity low limit. 1024 is maximal chromaticity chosen according to calc mode.

detect_chromaticity_end_tab.description: Color chromaticity high limit. 1024 is maximal chromaticity chosen according to calc mode.

detect_color0_skin_saturation_min_y_min.description: Minumum saturation value for skin when Y=Y_min.

detect_color0_skin_saturation_max_y_min.description: Maximum saturation value for skin when Y=Y_min.

detect_color0_skin_saturation_min_y_max.description: Minumum saturation value for skin when Y=Y_max.

detect_color0_skin_saturation_max_y_max.description: Maximum saturation value for skin when Y=Y_max.

boundary_weight_tab.description: Weight value at Color Range Borders.

transition_ratio_tab.description: smooth range transition ratio (with regards to color range) of each color region.

color0_transition_ratio_external.description: smooth range transition ratio (with regards to color 0 range) of each external color regions. q_ext = transition_ratio_external / boundery_probability[0].

luma_filter_threshold_scale_uv_tab.description: Gain factor for YLPF U/V-Base Thresholds .

chroma_filter_threshold_scale_y_tab.description: Gain factor for CLPF Y-Base Threshold.

chroma_filter_threshold_scale_uv_tab.description: Gain factor for CLPF U/V- Base Threshold .

luma_filter_base_far_modifier_y.description: YLPF Blend factor for CNR gain level for the Far base Luma thresholds. 0-no CNR modification on far thresholds at all. 4-full CNR modification on far with same scale and offset as in close. in between we blend.

luma_filter_base_far_modifier_uv.description: YLPF Blend factor for CNR gain level for the Far base Chroma thresholds. 0-no CNR modification on far thresholds at all. 4-full CNR modification on far with same scale and offset as in close. in between we blend.

chroma_filter_base_far_modifier_y.description: CLPF Blend factor for CNR gain level for the Far base Luma thresholds. 0-no CNR modification on far thresholds at all. 4-full CNR modification on far with same scale and offset as in close. in between we blend.

chroma_filter_base_far_modifier_uv.description: CLPF Blend factor for CNR gain level for the Far base Chroma thresholds. 0-no CNR modification on far thresholds at all. 4-full CNR modification on far with same scale and offset as in close. in between we blend.

luma_dcblend2_weight_scale_tab.description: Scale Factor for user defined DCBlend2 Y_Dc blend factor. (2048 == X16).

chroma_dcblend2_weight_restricted_scale_.description: Scale Factor for user defined DCBlend2 C_Dc blend factor. (2048 == X16). this scale is limited by chroma_lnr_cnr_dcblend2_target_factor with the following: . chroma_dcblend2_weight_scale (actual cnr scale influence of dcblend 2 blend factor ) = MIN( MAX(chroma_dcblend2_weight_restricted_scale , 2*128 - chroma_lnr_cnr_dcblend2_target_factor ) , chroma_lnr_cnr_dcblend2_target_factor ).

luma_flat_kernel_blend_weight_scale_tab.description: Scale Factor for user defined flat kernel blend factor. (2048 == X16).

y_threshold_per_uv_tab.description: threshold LutUV, points are located at the end of uv space (-128,127). Input uv values to the lut interpulation are limited with control_per_uv_limit. u_limited = min(u, control_per_uv_limit), v_limited = min(u, control_per_uv_limit). Output value =interp2( y_threshold_per_uv, (u_limited,v_limited) ).

y_threshold_close3_mod_scale.description: Luma filter, 3x3 luma derivative , 6 bits unsigned (0,2,4).

y_threshold_close3_mod_offset.description: Luma filter, 3x3 luma derivative , 11 bits signed (1,10,0).

y_threshold_der2_close3_mod_scale.description: Luma filter, 3x3 luma second order derivative scale, 6 bits unsigned (0,2,4).

y_threshold_der2_close3_mod_offset.description: Luma filter, 3x3 luma second order derivative offset 11 bits signed (1,10,0).

u_threshold_per_uv_tab.description: threshold LutUV, points are located at the end of uv space (-128,127). Input uv values to the lut interpulation are limited with control_per_uv_limit. u_limited = min(u, control_per_uv_limit), v_limited = min(u, control_per_uv_limit). Output value =interp2( y_threshold_per_uv, (u_limited,v_limited) ).

v_threshold_per_uv_tab.description: threshold LutUV, points are located at the end of uv space (-128,127). Input uv values to the lut interpulation are limited with control_per_uv_limit. u_limited = min(u, control_per_uv_limit), v_limited = min(u, control_per_uv_limit). Output value =interp2( y_threshold_per_uv, (u_limited,v_limited) ).

y_threshold_per_uv_tab.description: threshold LutUV, points are located at the end of uv space (-128,127). Input uv values to the lut interpulation are limited with control_per_uv_limit. u_limited = min(u, control_per_uv_limit), v_limited = min(u, control_per_uv_limit). Output value =interp2( y_threshold_per_uv, (u_limited,v_limited) ).

y_threshold_far_mod_scale.description: chroma_filter, 5x5 _Ythr modifier Far(5 chroma blocks but 7x7/9x9 for y pixels) scale/offset factors.

y_threshold_far_mod_offset.description: chroma_filter, 5x5 _Ythr modifier Far(5 chroma blocks but 7x7/9x9 for y pixels) scale/offset factors.

u_threshold_per_uv_tab.description: threshold LutUV, points are located at the end of uv space (-128,127). Input uv values to the lut interpulation are limited with control_per_uv_limit. u_limited = min(u, control_per_uv_limit), v_limited = min(u, control_per_uv_limit). Output value =interp2( y_threshold_per_uv, (u_limited,v_limited) ).

v_threshold_per_uv_tab.description: threshold LutUV, points are located at the end of uv space (-128,127). Input uv values to the lut interpulation are limited with control_per_uv_limit. u_limited = min(u, control_per_uv_limit), v_limited = min(u, control_per_uv_limit). Output value =interp2( y_threshold_per_uv, (u_limited,v_limited) ).

dcblend2_luma_strength_function_tab.description: Controls the strength of DCBlend2. Lut of how much to blend as a function YDCSize. Higher values reduce luminance noise significantly, at the expense of texture, granularity and sharpness. Lower values maintain the luminance noise levels, while preserving texture, granularity and sharpness.
dcblend2_luma_strength_function_tab.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.

dcblend2_chroma_strength_function_tab.description: Controls the strength of DCBlend2. Lut of how much to blend as a function CDCSize. (in case of filter2 ind extenstion interp is off, these values will be interpulated to [0,3] instead of [0,5]). Higher values reduce chromatic noise significantly, at the expense of texture, granularity and sharpness. Lower values maintain the chromatic noise levels, while preserving texture, granularity and sharpness.
dcblend2_chroma_strength_function_tab.additional_notes: In tuning_parameter_level, first parmater is for FULL pass, second for DC4, third for DC16 and last is for DC64. Linear interpolation.
